post.body:
oia‏ @oiax
Telegram 是很棒，可有一点不爽，有了通讯录权限后挨个扫一遍，还要提醒你张三李四王五谁在用 Telegram，用它的原因之一不就是隐私嘛，要不是用虚拟号注册不就给联系人、号码贩子、移动运营商或有关部门加了个 Telegram 用户的身份？

Riot‏ @RiotChat
End-to-end crypto is out on Riot on web, Android and (almost) iOS!! Check it out! @matrixdotorg (link: https://medium.com/@RiotChat/exciting-new-riot-release-get-ready-for-chatting-securely-acc93ecfe0a#.py0fyq7w3) medium.com/@RiotChat/exci…
